qbraid.circuits.library.standard_gates package¶

Submodules¶

qbraid.circuits.library.standard_gates.dcx module¶

class DCX(global_phase=0.0)[source]¶

Bases: qbraid.circuits.gate.Gate

A 2-qubit double CNOT gate consisting of two CNOTs place back-to-back with alternating control qubits. :param global_phase[Optional]: The global phase on the gate

property num_params¶

qbraid.circuits.library.standard_gates.h module¶

class H(global_phase=0.0)[source]¶

Bases: qbraid.circuits.gate.Gate

A single qubit rotation about the x+z axis bringing a state from the computational basis to the diagonal basis, i.e \(|+\rangle,|-\rangle\) basis.

Parameters

global_phase[Optional] – The global phase on the gate

control(num_ctrls=1)[source]¶
class CH(global_phase=0.0)[source]¶

Bases: qbraid.circuits.controlledgate.ControlledGate

Controlled version of Hadamard Gate. :param global_phase[Optional]: The global phase on the gate

qbraid.circuits.library.standard_gates.hpow module¶

class HPow(exponent=1.0, global_phase=0.0)[source]¶

Bases: qbraid.circuits.library.standard_gates.powgate.PowGate

A power version of the Hadamard gate. :type exponent: float :param exponent: Power to raise the gate to :param global_phase[Optional]: The global phase on the gate

qbraid.circuits.library.standard_gates.i module¶

class I(global_phase=0.0)[source]¶

Bases: qbraid.circuits.gate.Gate

A single qubit identity gate that keeps qubit in same state for a wait cycle. Should not be optimized. :param global_phase[Optional]: The global phase on the gate

Bases: qbraid.circuits.gate.Gate

qbraid.circuits.library.standard_gates.measure module¶

class Measure(global_phase=0)[source]¶

Bases: qbraid.circuits.gate.Gate

Place a single qubit measurement to collapse the state of the qubit. :param global_phase[Optional]: The global phase on the gate

qbraid.circuits.library.standard_gates.phase module¶

class Phase(theta, global_phase=0.0)[source]¶

Bases: qbraid.circuits.gate.Gate

Single qubit rotation about the x-y plane. :type theta: float :param theta: Rotation in the x-y plane :param global_phase[Optional]: The global phase on the gate

control(num_ctrls=1)[source]¶
